original_title: Retro Stag Party: Busty Stars Of The 60's: All Color Spectacular
overview: Welcome to the 3rd edition of RETRO STAG PARTY: Busty Stars Of The 60's.  This is our new All Color Spectacular edition.  More of the biggest bosomed babes in the history of glamour, and this time they're all in living color!  These were the kind of stag loops that brought the living color to any adult party in the 60's.  Featuring such legends as Even Meyer, you'll also be treated to a "Battle Of The Bosoms" between Uschi Digard and Candy Sample!  Bigger is better... ON TOP!
tagline: Starring Eve Meyer Candy Samples Lillian Parker Michelle Angelo Lee Germain Uschi Digard and more of the biggest bosoms in the biz!
title: Retro Stag Party: Busty Stars Of The 60's: All Color Spectacular
